org.appkit.util
Class Texts

java.lang.Object
  org.appkit.util.Texts

public final class Texts
extends Object

Serves as a store for i18n-texts and provides methods for working with them.

fromResources(Locale)

fromResources

public static Texts fromResources(Locale locale)
Loads i18n-texts using a file from resources and a specified locale.
Example: Passing Locale.ENGLISH would load i18n/en.properties from resources.

See Also:
translateComponent(Component, Locale, String)

translateComponent

public static void translateComponent(Component type,
                                      Locale locale,
                                      String customI18NFile)
Translates a Component by loading language files from resources and using all keys of the files to find containing controls. I18n-texts are set by calling setText() on Buttons, Texts and Labels. Other controls are ignored until they implement Texts.CustomTranlation.
The files are loaded in the following order:

  • if customI18NFile was specified it is loaded, the filename used is i18n/customI18NFile.language.properties
  • the file for the component is loaded, the filename used is i18n/components/type.language.properties
  • the appkit-defaults are loaded, the filename used is i18n/appkit-default.language.properties

    See Also:
    Component, Templating, Texts.CustomTranlation

    • asMap

    public ImmutableMap<String,String> asMap()
    Return the loaded texts as a Map.

    get

    public String get(String identifier,
                  Object... values)
    Returns the i18n-text for the given identifier, formatted with the values

    Returns:
    "missing identifier" if no string was found
